title: Bonus 17: A Conversation with Dan Libenson of Judaism Unbound
itunes:title: Bonus: A Conversation with Dan Libenson of Judaism Unbound
description: My special guest is Dan Libenson of the Judaism Unbound podcast. We talk about the Bible, the history of the Jewish religion, the difficulties of translation, how Jews and Christians think about God, and many other matters. All good fun!
content:encoded: My special guest is Dan Libenson of the Judaism Unbound podcast. We talk about the Bible, the history of the Jewish religion, the difficulties of translation, how Jews and Christians think about God, and many other matters. All good fun!
itunes:subtitle: Dan Libenson discusses the next Jewish future.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Dan Libenson
